channel.title: Guild Wars Nightfall Vrs. Runescape Vrs. WoW
channel.description: Well I like Guild Wars because you dont pay monthly and good graphics! Why i dont like runescape and W0W Runescape: runescape is for fags and people who have no life WoW: Just plain to exspensive heard its pretty good but not worth the price
